# Contact & Support

We are committed to building an active community around VegVault and provide multiple channels for communication, support, and collaboration.

## Get in Touch

### Primary Communication Hub

We use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/OndrejMottl/VegVault/discussions) as our main platform for community interaction. Whether you have questions, ideas for new features, or want to connect with other users, this is the best place to start.

**Before posting, please:**
- Search existing discussions to avoid duplicates
- Use clear, descriptive titles
- Provide context and relevant details

### Report Issues & Bugs

Found a problem? Please use our [Issues page](https://github.com/OndrejMottl/VegVault/issues) to report bugs or technical problems.

**Issue Reporting Guidelines:**

1. **Check first**: Search [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/OndrejMottl/VegVault/discussions) Q&A section and existing [Issues](https://github.com/OndrejMottl/VegVault/issues) to see if your problem has been reported
2. **Use filters**: Search using keywords and `labels` to narrow down results
3. **Be specific**: When opening a new issue, provide detailed information including:
   - Clear description of the problem
   - Expected vs. actual behavior
   - Steps to reproduce the issue
   - Relevant files, code, or screenshots

**To Report a New Issue:**
1. Click the green **New issue** button
2. Select **Bug report** template
3. Fill in all relevant details
4. Choose appropriate labels
5. Submit and await response from our team
